title: Quick-add button for current observation page
description: Add a way to quickly save the current observation to the list. Could be a browser action button, keyboard shortcut, or injected button on the page. User should be able to categorize as TODO or Research.

title: Design data model for storing observation links
description: Define the data structures for TODO items (URL + optional note) and Research items (URL + metadata like species, observer, date). Must support browser local storage and JSON export.

title: Extract metadata from observation page for research items
description: When saving a Research item, automatically capture: species name, observer username, observation date, location, and any other useful metadata from the iNaturalist page.

title: Implement sidebar UI with list view and search
description: Create the main sidebar interface showing saved observations. Include search/filter functionality and category tabs/filters for TODO vs Research items.

title: Set up Firefox extension boilerplate
description: Create manifest.json (decide v2 vs v3), directory structure, and basic extension that can load in Firefox. Should be configured for inaturalist.org domain.

title: Export and backup functionality
description: Export all data to a JSON file for backup. Also allow importing from a backup file to restore data. Research items should have a format suitable for external tools.

title: TODO workflow with mark complete
description: Allow marking TODO items as complete. Completed items should be visually distinct and optionally hidden/archived. Track completion date.
